name: Omnis Technologies
tagline: Managed IT Services keeps your business running.
description:
Omnis Technologies has supported businesses in Northwestern Pennsylvania and Western New York since 2002. We support businesses and non-profits of all shapes and sizes by ensuring their technology is running efficiently.
Our goal is to safeguard our clients' data and make sure that their technology is supporting them in reaching their goals. We want to save you money and frustration with your business's technology
